name: Faisal Karim
reviews: The board quality is amazing. The AM3+ board I was replacing was paper thin in comparison to this ASUS ROG board. The thing is solid. This board has plenty of features and is well worth the extra cost over some cheaper entry level B450 or B550 boards. You simply get what you pay for. This is paired up with a 3700x and runs butter smooth.
